Article.ArticleTitle: Effect of Phenolic Compounds on Human Health.

AbstractText: This book, based on a Special Issue of Nutrients, contains a total of 12 papers (8 original research and 4 reviews) on the effect of phenolic compounds on human health [...].

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Department of Pharmacology, Pharmacognosy and Botany, Faculty of Pharmacy, Universidad Complutense de Madrid, 28040 Madrid, Spain.
